segments.text: What a funny sight in this kitchen drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's meticulously drying that plate, towel bunched up nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got no idea about the water cascading from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a little waterfall right there on the counter edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, oh they're up to mischief with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on the stool, hand diving in for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tipping, but he's determined, plate in the other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching too, like a team of cookie bandits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: So cute how they're plotting behind mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's open to a pretty garden, adding to the charm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene's got me smiling at the everyday antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hope they get their cookies before everything tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR
